about_the_game:
DLC: "Rivals Squad Full Version"

This DLC will revolutionize your Rivals Squad experience with exclusive additions and exceptional advantages!

Exclusive and Stunning Skins
Unlock a collection of exclusive skins designed to transform your fighters into legendary heroes. From elegant designs to futuristic styles, these skins reflect the glory and prestige of invincible champions.

You will unlock the "Competition" mode which will allow you to show who is the best and earn diamonds to exchange them for Skins or something else.

Access to Maps House, Little Game and unlock all game mods
Explore the mysterious and thrilling Map House, an uncharted area filled with secrets, hidden passages, and unique strategic advantages. This map offers a dynamic and diverse environment for captivating battles as you take on the role of a miniature-sized character.

In-Game Dollars Bonus
Receive a substantial bonus of 50,000 in-game dollars to bolster your arsenal, customize your equipment, and assert your supremacy on the battlefield. This sum gives you a crucial initial advantage on your path to victory.

Join and get ready to dazzle your rivals with exclusive skins, conquer new territories on Map House, and dominate with your 50,000 in-game dollars! A unique opportunity for the true champions of Rivals Squad.

name: Rivals Squad Full Version

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This DLC includes exclusive skins for your character, access to the Map House in a miniature world, and 50,000 in-game dollars to purchase superpowers, skins, and much more.
supported_languages:
English*, French
*languages with full audio support
